So for those wondering, this is what the VR world is currently working on: Gloves that allow you to feel touch in VR (working model complete, they are working on adding even more touch), a prototype that is a bracelet that catches the signals from your brain to your hand and can accurately copy it in a pc, a suit that let’s you feel hot/cold and touch including impacts, shoes that you can walk in (not run) that place you back to the middle of the room and finally a treadmill that allows you to run and jump in any direction in vr.

The gloves are being made by meta (facebook company)
